title: NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS through a wall/ Mesmeric Techniques of Dr. Paret
description:
In this video you will see a hypnotic induction through a wall and a demonstration of hypnotic transference with the non-verbal hypnosis techniques of Dr. Marco Paret. All these techniques are exclusively taught at the non-verbal hypnosis school of Dr. Paret. Dr. Paret is the world's leading authority on Mesmerism and Fascination -  the hypnotic power of the gaze and he is sharing his knowledge with his students on his Masterclasses all around the world. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. 

Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
https://www.youtube.com/user/neurolin...  

Join our Italian channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/pnlcoaching
